website_summaries.verdict: Bicycle with 14 speeds with a high-tensile steel frame and fork for high performance.
pros: 2 sizes offered to help you find the best model for your needs
Excellent quality and all-steel design for durability
Saddle is a comfortable size and shape for long-distance rides
Good tire quality for different riding conditions
cons: Not the best option for women taller than 5 feet 8 inches

customer_reviews.title: You're buying a frame and wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Almost every componet on this bike is trash, especially the brakes. I've replaced a ton of stuff on this bike. It's a good heavy frame for a larger rider. The wheels are decent. Not a bad buybut not a project for amateurs. *update! My seat post failed on me going down a steep bridge. Almost killed me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm a novice rider and have owned the bike for two months now. I'm really happy with the purchase. The bike rides and operates perfectly in my opinion. Update- I have had the (mens) bike for some time now and it's still going strong with no issues what-so-ever. I just ordered the women's version for my girlfriend because I was so happy with the original purchase. If you're a novice rider you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cardinals314

customer_reviews.title: Very cool for the price
customer_reviews.text: My first road bike. I ride approximately 50 miles a week for excercise, and this bike has been great so far. I rode a decent fixie for two years prior to this. The bike is light and very smooth, the shifters are great as well. Assembly was pretty easy if you're mildly handy. It looks cool and rides great, that's enough for me
customer_reviews.author: North Correa

customer_reviews.title: Terrific bike.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Can't believe it's this inexpensive. Have been riding for about a week now. Components are great and it rides smooth. Not hard to put together, but I would recommend having a professional tune it up. Seat takes a little getting used to, but it's not terrible. Tires are crap, so I upgraded them. A few upgrades here and there and this bike is awesome. Oh and it looks fantastic. I would recommend this for anyone who wants a solid inexpensive bike for casual riding.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect! Great first road bike!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I had never ordered a bike online before and the first shipment didn't have all the parts but Amazon was great and sent the replacement right away. The replacement bike had all the parts and was very easy for my boyfriend to assemble for me. I absolutely love riding it and the pictures are spot on! I dare say it's prettier in person!! Definitely a great first road bike for a college student!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little bike for a small price
customer_reviews.text: Good little bike for a small price. I'm not a "serious" cyclist, but I like to go fast when I do ride, this beats the piss out of my old mountain bike and the small size was perfect for me (I'm 5'5").
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband like it, have it assembled by a pro...
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this bike for himself for christmas, and he loves it. Its a great quality bike, although I must recommend getting a shop to put it together for you, he tried to do it himself and snapped a part and got frustrated, then ended up at the shop anyway...
customer_reviews.author: AmyKay87

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level road bike and a bang for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good entry level road bike and a bang for the buck .I have used this bike for a month and has been very comfortable. The only downside I see is the seat, which can be less slippery and soft. Apart from that I have no complaints. I
customer_reviews.author: HBP

customer_reviews.title: Good ride at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent road bike. Feels light and gear ratios make climbing a breeze. Ordered two--one arrived on time and another was delayed by three days (Prime). Bikes were undamaged. Easy to assemble at home; shifts smoothly and brakes work well. We have taken the bikes on a 20-miler and a 30-miler and the bikes were fun to ride. Price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Bike was really easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Bike was really easy to set up. However, it destroyed my back. You have to continuously hover over the brakes in the city. The way the brakes are positioned on this bike didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the best cheap road bike!
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice rider and I was looking for a good road bike but not too expensive for my first purchase. I am not disappointed at all! I am a 5'4 woman and I bought the smaller size. The bike fits well for me. It was the first time that I had to assemble a bike and it was pretty simple even if instructions was not so clear. I would recommend this bike as a good first road bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bike at a great price point. It was easy to assemble and worked well right out of the box. I feel that if I were to take it to a local bike shop and have them give it a good once over and tune up this would rival a very high-end bike. It feels very solid and well-built. Can't be beat for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great ride that somebody took it from my garage
customer_reviews.text: Such a great ride that somebody took it from my garage. I hope I screwed up on setting up the brakes. Seriously though, from the bike rides I got to take, I was pleased. The seat could use an upgrade for those of us with little to no junk in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: HereComesTheSun

customer_reviews.title: This bike is nice between the price
customer_reviews.text: This bike is nice between the price . Although there are some friction in the wheel during sripping ( I think ). I perceive disappointed ,but the queilty and controller are great. This bike is good for fun or go to a short distance , because personally I feel the sit is bad , not comfortable for long distance. So I think to substitute the sit is essential. If u wantna for fun and ride in ur country, I would recommend u to buy it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recieved in good condition, had to adjust brake pads and make ...
customer_reviews.text: Recieved in good condition, had to adjust brake pads and make sure everything was tightened up. Alot of youtube videos to help me figure it out and advice from some friends that are seasoned riders. Overall, I'm happy with the bike. I've received some compliments about the component quality for the price. I've been riding on it 2 weeks now (6 rides for about 50 miles) without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent bike for the price. So far did not had any problem. Seems quite robust and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Piccolo Grande

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for Big Body
customer_reviews.text: Great road bike. Perfect starter bike especially if you need steel frame. silky smooth shifting and comfortable. I did change the seat but everything else is perfect. I am 6'1 240 and I move
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. I've suggested it to several friends. After putting a couple of hundred miles on it, the handle bar caps have fallen off and the brakes needed some adjustment. Overall definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dane de Wet

customer_reviews.title: The bike is great! It arrived with small chips on the frame ...
customer_reviews.text: The bike is great! It arrived with small chips on the frame and my front brake didn't work. I assembled it myself but i recommend on going to your local bike shop because the bike had no grease on any of the parts so it felt still. After the visit, it felt perfect and smooth. The bike itself is a little on the heavy end, but all the components and the frame are solid. I would get a different saddle as this one is a little rigid for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Easy to assemble. Nice look . Gears and breakers needed small adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Tsf

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful road bike although the front deflector arrived cracked inside the packing box !!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Wallace

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bike
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bike. Looks sharp and rides nice. I am still getting use to the new style handlebars and gear shifts, but that's just me. I never rode a bike like this before. Rides smooth and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Skwarlo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bike!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! Had to put better tires and another spacer, but it is very streamlined and easy to carry up three flights of stairs. One of the greatest purchases I have made in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D'Amore

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter bike for someone looking to see if they ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought with for my 14 yr old who is 6'3. He was joined me in road cycling and loves his bike. This is a great starter bike for someone looking to see if they like the sport. It was easy to assemble. We did bring to our local bike shop for a once over to be sure all is go. They thought is was a great bike for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BIKE FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good bike, the brakes and brake levers are kind of cheep but overall it's built pretty well, good bike for a good price
customer_reviews.author: craigf1

customer_reviews.title: Good bike it looks
customer_reviews.text: Good bike it looks, but came with the Rim damaged, same as the brakes =(. Apart from it, it seems a very good bike (good reviews as well). Please hlep Amazon doesn't reply back for the refund
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL CANO

customer_reviews.title: Steel Frame
customer_reviews.text: Got it today assembled it took it for a spin ... and what a great ride! everything worked perfectly brakes, shifting. I recommend this bike to everybody who never rode a steel frame bike before.
customer_reviews.author: Mario L.

customer_reviews.title: Bike looks good. Chain had a bad link when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Bike looks good. Chain had a bad link when it arrived, and we took it to the local bike shop to get it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: In the Middle

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, just buy a Target bike. The front derailleur didn't work and the brakes are HORRIBLE. I found out too late to be able to do anything about it. I had to widen the front derailleur to prevent severe chain drag as well as cut the cable connection to the derailleur.
customer_reviews.author: Brieann Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Red Dragon
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike. We with brother call it "red dragon". Fast, unbeatable price
customer_reviews.author: durovem

customer_reviews.title: Great Cycle that can grow with you
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike. My wife put it together, in a little over an hour. It was pretty straight forward. I was new to road bikes, so the shifters took a moment to figure out, but after a quick YouTube search, viola! no problems. I love the bike, and for the price, I would say it is more than an entry level cycle. The really nice thing is that it can be upgraded as the rider becomes more experienced. Even being steel, I find it to be very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bicycle shifts perfect. It rode super smooth but the breaking system ...
customer_reviews.text: The bicycle shifts perfect. It rode super smooth but the breaking system didn't function properly. I tried once down a hill and about ran into a car going.
customer_reviews.author: Seleslie Harris

customer_reviews.title: It's a good buy at reasonable prices
customer_reviews.text: It's a good buy at reasonable prices. I have put about 500 miles on it and it's still running good.
customer_reviews.author: Son

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a great bike.
customer_reviews.text: came scratched up on one bar but i was needed to use it and it didn't detract from the functionality of the bike. Otherwise a great bike.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent thach

customer_reviews.title: Bad stem
customer_reviews.text: Threads were completely stripped out on arrival, glad I checked before attaching handlebars.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Left Pedal Came off.
customer_reviews.text: Dear seller, The left pedal mounting hole did not have strong internal threading and quickly washed away. As a result, the pedal came off during my first attempt of a long trip (more than 2 hours) a month and a half after purchasing the bike. Please send a part replacement for that handler and the pedal. (left side) Yoann
customer_reviews.author: Yoann Buratti

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Rear wheel's tube was broken when I got the bike. Need to pay extra 19 dollars to fix that broken tube.
customer_reviews.author: Ao Li

customer_reviews.title: One step away from a scam
customer_reviews.text: Bike didn't even come with pedals, the chain wasn't on the derailleurs, the quick-release latch for the front tire is missing, the derailleur is bent and touches the back spokes, and the paint is all chipped. Terrible package/product handling by the distributor. The only reason this gets more than 1 star is because the bike itself isn't a bad product, just the distribution and handling of it is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable steel road bike. Handlebar form could use ...
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable steel road bike. Handlebar form could use some improvement and the seat is a little bit awkward, but over all this is a very solid bike and will last you forever as long as you don't leave it out in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan martinez

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This product had pedals strip out in the first week of real use. Unfortunately it was purchased well in advance of the occasion it was intended putting it outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very well built , safe bike for short And easy Going Riding Pleasure
customer_reviews.text: I was able to Put the BIKE together fairly quickly, But my Shifters don't seem to want to engage (( the instruction for the STI SPEED SHIFTERS don't seem to be well written or illustrated )) Also the handlebars are fixed , so look into finding a different handlebar stem or a stem extension with spacers (( 5-24-15 _ UPDATE )) After reading the instruction on STI SHIFTER Operation more closely , they work just fine I AM 5 ft. 11in. & The Bike Is OK For Me .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Metoyer

product_meta.title: Giordano Libero Acciao Road Bike
product_meta.description: The Venus Acciao is the perfect entry level road bike designed specifically for women. It's 14-speed Shimano Tourney STI drive train will allow for quick shifting to keep you moving down the road. It features 32 hole high v-profile alloy rims, a high tensile steel frame and fork, Pro wheel 170mm aluminum cranks, and a 1-1/8 inch alloy thread less stem. The Kenda 700x25c tires and women's specific saddle keep the ride comfortable.
feature_bullets: Women's specific high tensile steel frame and fork
